name: AlexCare
0:
”Alexa, open Alex Care”
”Alexa, tell Alex Care to take my blood pressure”
”Alexa, ask Alex Care for my report”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alex care
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you monitor your Blood Pressure daily? Need assistance? Use Alex Care by saying “Alexa, tell Alex Care that today my blood pressure is 120 by 80”
Using the Alex Care skill, you can record your blood pressure daily and even ask for your history. Alex Care will take your blood pressure daily and tell if its within the normal range or not.
Enable the Alex Care skill on your Alexa Device just by saying, "Enable Alex Care"

You just have to tell Alex Care your blood pressure reading daily and rest is with him. Alex Care includes tips and precautions for your alarming blood pressure readings. Now you can ask Alex Care for your blood pressure history and with smart analysis he will tell you if your blood pressure is normal or not. 
With monthly report you can know your current monthly average blood pressure along with comparison of your last month's average blood pressure.

Increased Blood Pressure is a common problem for aged people which can also cause heart attacks and strokes, so better be aware of your increasing Blood Pressure, use Alex Care for easy monitoring of blood pressure.

Start using the Alex Care skill by saying any of the following, 
"Alexa, open Alex Care"
"Alexa, tell Alex Care to take my blood pressure"
"Alexa, ask Alex Care for my report"

Disclaimer: This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

Enable Alex Care skill now and stay healthy.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
